price: 107. Tokkel Nabii Muusa isi Caxxa Qambiseeh, edde luk usuk too waqdi Qellu sinni Baadeysa yekke.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya thuʿ'bānun mubīnun
